mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pass, name, nickname, department, joindate, no) values (#{id}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{department}, sysdate, member_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select * from department order by no asc
select id from member where id = #{id}
select nickname from member where nickname = #{nick}
select * from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
mapper.update: update member set pass = #{pass}, nickname = #{nickname}, department =#{department}, email = #{email} where no = #{no}
